blocks.finalBreadcrumb: Enterprise Development and Consulting for .NET 8 Migration

blocks.heading: Upgrade to .NET 8 for Faster, More Secure Applications
blocks.description: Achieve cloud-native innovation in a proven, enterprise-ready ecosystem trusted by Microsoft.

features.heading: Lightning-Fast Performance
features.description: Use Native AOT for smaller memory footprints, quicker load times, and a better user experience

features.heading: Cloud-Ready Scalability
features.description: Deploy in any environment, so your apps can grow alongside your organization.

features.heading: Strong Security
features.description: Guard your solutions with built-in encryption and compliance tools backed by Microsoft’s platform.

features.heading: Future-Proof Platform
features.description: Enjoy Long-Term Support (LTS), regular updates, and new features like C# 12.

blocks.heading: Our Phased Approach
blocks.body: Migrating to .NET 8 can be complex and expensive if not done correctly. SSW is here to guide you through a proven approach with Microsoft-certified consultants who understand the .NET ecosystem inside and out.

accordionItems.label: 1. Initial Assessment
accordionItems.content: We evaluate your current systems in a Specification Review, determining how each component aligns with .NET 8

accordionItems.label: 2. Strategy Selection
accordionItems.content: We recommend either a gradual rollout or a full upgrade, depending on your priorities and timelines.

accordionItems.label: 3. Planning
accordionItems.content:
Refactor: Update existing code to run on .NET 8.

Replace: Find a ready-made product with the functions you need.

Rewrite: Build from the ground up if no equivalents exist.

accordionItems.label: 4. Execution
accordionItems.content: Our team follows a careful migration plan that reduces downtime and keeps disruptions to a minimum.

accordionItems.label: 5. Ongoing Support
accordionItems.content: After go-live, we stay available for any tweaks and help your team settle into the new environment.

blocks.heading: Why SSW?
blocks.description: Migrating to .NET 8 can be complex and expensive if not done correctly. SSW is here to guide you through a proven approach with Microsoft-certified consultants who understand the .NET ecosystem inside and out.

features.heading: Expert Guidance
features.description: Our team has years of experience moving legacy applications to the latest .NET version, consistently reducing risk and cutting costs for our clients.

features.heading: Documented Best Practices
features.description: We’ve recorded our hard-earned insights in our Rules to Better .NET 8 Migration to ensure nothing is overlooked.

blocks.heading: Why .NET 8?
blocks.body: .NET 8 is Microsoft’s newest Long-Term Support (LTS) release—perfect for stability, security, and modern development. By moving to .NET 8, you gain:

cards.heading: Reliable Updates
cards.description: Regular improvements and bug fixes for peace of mind.

cards.heading: Advanced Features
cards.description: Explore cutting-edge tools like C# 12, Native AOT, and source code generation.

cards.image: /images/Louis Test Images/Incident/Move fast when you break things _ incident.io/image.png
cards.heading: Cloud-Native Options
cards.description: Fresh Eats Local, a farm-to-table food delivery service, needed a better way to engage customers. We developed a user-friendly mobile app allowing customers to easily order, track deliveries, and support local farmers, driving significant business growth.

blocks.heading: Talk to us about your  project today
blocks.description: Connect with our Account Managers to discuss how we can help.
